DOC.brief_summary: The level four biomarkers measure patient ' plasma induction anaesthesia . There biomarkers NT-ProBNP , ST2 , Galectin-3 GDF-15 . The level marker correlate early ( 30 day ) late ( one year ) patient ' prognosis functional recovery ( MLHFQ score ) .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Elective/urgent aortic mitral valve surgery isolation combine CABG Emergency salvage surgery Inability consent Previous cardiac surgery Stage IV V CDK ( GFR ≤ 30 ml/min ) dialysis Active Endocarditis Liver cirrhosis Chronic atrial fibrillation Pacemaker
